meanings.definition: A person who is determined or persistent in their actions.
meanings.sent1: The doggoner never gave up on finding his lost toy.
meanings.sent2: She's a real doggoner when it comes to finishing her homework on time.
meanings.sent3: The doggoner kept trying to teach his old dog new tricks.
meanings.sent4: Like a doggoner chasing a squirrel, he pursued his dream relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The image of the doggoner climbing the mountain stayed with me.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation of frustration or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Doggoner! I forgot my lunch at home again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, doggoner! I spilled juice on my favorite shirt.
meanings.sent3: Doggoner, why does it always rain on my day off?
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the moment, she exclaimed, 'Doggoner, I can't believe this!'
meanings.sent5: The loud 'doggoner' echoed through the empty hallway.
